overview: Jenteal is a seemingly innocent girl who is really a scheming, conniving, manipulative sonofabitch. Sounds like any ex – wives you know? Welcome to Toni English’s Born Bad, a Wave film in which Jenteal is her bad self, and Crystal Breeze, Nyrobi Knight and Stephanie Swift aren’t far behind. Victim? Angel? Devil? The answer is yes.
title: Born Bad
